stories.text:
We'll launch Utopiops (https://www.utopiops.com) on Monday 23rd of May. Utopiops helps you deploy your applications to AWS in a minute, with a built-in CI/CD, monitoring and notifications (The very first deployment takes longer than all the other deployments).

Utopiops is going to be a replacement for services such as Heroku, Render, Netlify and Vercel.

For the first two to three weeks, we're planning to give access to 10 users and work closely with them. Depending on the progress we might increase the number.

All you need is an AWS account and 30 minutes of time for initial on-boarding. The users will get one year of free access to the service.

Please let me know if you're interested.
stories.title: Deploy any applications to AWS in 1 minute
